objects.src: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' viewBox='0 0 1080 1080'><rect width='1080' height='1080' fill='#21011E'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#3B0F37'/><rect x='540' y='0' width='540' height='540' fill='#2A0828'/><rect x='0' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#130211'/><rect x='540' y='540' width='540' height='540' fill='#4C1748'/><g opacity='0.15'><circle cx='100' cy='100' r='50' fill='#FF94E5'/><circle cx='980' cy='980' r='50' fill='#FF94E5'/><circle cx='980' cy='100' r='30' fill='#FF94E5'/><circle cx='100' cy='980' r='30' fill='#FF94E5'/></g><g opacity='0.1'><path d='M0 140 L1080 140' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 280 L1080 280' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 420 L1080 420' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 560 L1080 560' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 700 L1080 700' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 840 L1080 840' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M0 980 L1080 980' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M140 0 L140 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M280 0 L280 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M420 0 L420 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M560 0 L560 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M700 0 L700 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M840 0 L840 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/><path d='M980 0 L980 1080' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-width='1'/></g><path d='M540 0 L540 1080' stroke='#FF94E5' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><path d='M0 540 L1080 540' stroke='#FF94E5' stroke-width='2' opacity='0.3'/><rect x='0' y='0' width='1080' height='1080' fill='url(#gradient)'/><defs><linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0' y1='0' x2='1080' y2='1080' gradientUnits='userSpaceOnUse'><stop offset='0' stop-color='#4A0645' stop-opacity='0.1'/><stop offset='1' stop-color='#000000' stop-opacity='0.3'/></linearGradient></defs></svg>

objects.text:
• Complete 3-piece makeup set
• Premium liquid corrector
• Professional mascara
• Long-lasting lip color

product_details.name: Venus Professional Makeup Kit - 3-Piece Essential Beauty Collection
product_details.description:
• Complete 3-piece makeup set for professional-quality results
• Includes Liquid Corrector with precision applicator for flawless coverage
• Professional-grade mascara for dramatic lash enhancement
• Rich brown lip color for sophisticated finish
• Premium black packaging for elegant aesthetics
• Travel-friendly sizes perfect for on-the-go touch-ups
• Long-lasting, high-quality formula for all-day wear
• 30ml Liquid Corrector with easy-application tube
• Smudge-proof mascara with innovative brush design
• Cruelty-free beauty products for conscious consumers

banner_details:
This banner design promotes a 3-piece makeup kit with a bold and stylish look. It features a grid-based dark purple background made up of various deep shades and subtle linear and circular overlays, lending a modern and structured aesthetic. The main highlight is the prominently placed product image (`product_image`) in the right center area. On the left side, concise promotional details (`description`) highlight the contents and features of the makeup kit. The top-left area includes the brand (`heading`), the product name (`subheading`), and a tagline (`tagline`). The price (`price`) is distinctly shown in large pink text, and a compelling call-to-action button (`cta_button` and `cta`) in pastel pink beneath it entices users to "BUY NOW."

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Plum: `#21011E`
- Wine Purple: `#3B0F37`
- Eggplant: `#2A0828`
- Black Cherry: `#130211`
- Lilac Pink (Accent): `#FF94E5`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases three cosmetic items in sleek, minimalistic packaging that primarily utilizes deep, sophisticated tones. Dominant colors include glossy black (#0A0A0A), metallic charcoal (#2C2C2C), warm coral-orange (#F25C4D), and rich chocolate brown (#5A3629). Black acts as a bold, luxurious base, enhancing the premium feel of the brand. The coral-orange on the liquid corrector contrasts sharply against the black, drawing immediate attention, while the brown lip product balances the palette with earthy warmth. The subtle gloss and matte finishes heighten the contrast and emphasize individual product identities. This palette reflects elegance, professionalism, and modern femininity for an attractive ad banner.
